last_episode_to_air.name: Shoobop Gone / Flap Your Own Way
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mi loses a favorite guitar, Shoobop and can't find inspiration to sing without it. / Do flies! Do wishes he could flap faster, but discovers his flying speed might be just what's needed to save the day.

name: Do, Re & Mi
overview: Join birdie friends Do, Re and Mi in the musical world of Beebopsburgh, an island where instruments grow in the Falsetto Forest and a giant Music Mountain towers above all their adventures. Discover the sounds and melodies, move to the beat and see how music helps solve any problem.

episodes.name: Curious Birdious / Rain Rain You Can Stay
episodes.overview: Do is awakened by the sound of a beat and wants to figure out who's making it and why it's causing his foot to tap. / When a rainstorm blows into Beebopsburgh, Mi's house begins to leak ruining their picnic plans.

episodes.name: Best Buggy Blues / Listen to Your Body
episodes.overview: When Presto goes on vacation to visit his family for an overnight, Mi really misses him. Do and Re help Mi feel better. / When Re hurts her tail, her friends try their hardest to keep her calm and let her body heal.

episodes.name: Just Won't Quit / Look at Me, Little Me
episodes.overview: Do learns that if he keeps trying, he can master one of the steps to flying - a spectacular landing. / Re has been asked to perform with Flora and the Flamingo-gos but doubts her tiny self next to the flamingos she admires so much.

episodes.name: Raspberry Cupcakes / Together We're Not Alone
episodes.overview: Re tries to teach the chickies to make raspberry tarts but first has to find the best way to get their attention. / When the friends lose their way in the forest, they retrace their steps by following the sounds they heard on their way in.

episodes.name: Maestro Moon Day / Feathery Friends Day
episodes.overview: Re gets the hiccups and thinks that there's no way she can sing a special song to celebrate Maestro Moon while bouncing around. / Mi writes a special song for the friends on Feathery Friends Day. But when Mi can't sing, the birds mess up the lyrics in a funny case of singing "telephone."

episodes.name: Happy Hatchiversary / Shake Your Tail Feathers
episodes.overview: The friends make a gift for Juan Peacock and learn that they can't all work at the same time. So they work—and sing—in rounds to get the job done. / Do, Re and Mi help Seymore Saymore gain the confidence he needs to dance at the big Beebopsburgh dance.

episodes.name: Follow the Conductor / Birdie Opera
episodes.overview: When Do, Re and Mi can't figure out how to get the chickies to follow them home for lunch, they learn what job a conductor has and how it can help them. / It's Beatberry Picking Day and Do wants the birdies to beat the record and fill 10 buckets, but it's so hot out, the birdies struggle in their effort.

episodes.name: Movin' to the Groove / Take a Deep Breath
episodes.overview: Mi has an idea for an adventure--to hike up to top of Music Mountain and snowboard down it. But when Do and Re aren't following Mi's plan exactly, Mi becomes frustrated. / Re becomes overly concerned that the Spring Sing festivities won't be perfect—and this year, she's in charge!

episodes.name: Hush a Hummingbird / You Gotta Try Try Try
episodes.overview: The birdies set off on a camping trip and Harmony & Melody's starry night show, but Re is so excited, she can't calm down to sleep. / Juan Peacock boasts about being good at Beak Ball, but quits playing when he's not good on the field. The birdies learn the truth—he's never played before!—and help him try again.

episodes.name: Beebopsburgh Rocks / Gimme a High Feather
episodes.overview: Mi's envious of Juan Peacock and Pequena's travels outside Beebopsburgh and decides to leave town for more exciting adventures. / Do, Re & Mi help their friends Conga and Bongo paint their room, but discover the siblings have very different ideas about the paint color.

episodes.name: Waiting for Seymore / A Song to See
episodes.overview: Mi's very excited to open a package on Mi's doorstep, until the birds discover the package is actually for Seymore Saymore. They search Beebopsburgh for Seymore, because Mi is having a hard time waiting to open it. / Ahoy! Do, Re & Mi discover a musical treasure map while playing pirates with Seymore Saymore and set off to find it.

episodes.name: Hootenanny Jam / Bicycle Built for You
episodes.overview: Do, Re & Mi set out on a quest to find an instrument for Do. / Re feels left out when Mi gets a new bicycle built for two, that seems better suited for bigger birds like Mi and Do.

episodes.name: Bird Bath Blunder / Fasolati
episodes.overview: The birdies try and cool off on a hot day by making birdie baths. Mi gets frustrated when they can't get it quite right. / Re's having an off day --nothing is going her way and she's frustrated. Her friends set out to help her enjoy Feather Fair and change her mood with a cheery song.

episodes.name: Birdie Bake-Off / Sleep-O-Over
episodes.overview: Re bakes her special Beat Berry Pie to try to win the Best in Bake Off blue ribbon, but worries she might lose. In a panic, she adds a last-minute ingredient--a very sticky one! / Do's excited about hosting a sleepover for Re and Mi, but things go awry when more friends show up than he invited. Where will everybirdie sleep?

episodes.name: Dance Til You Drop / Star Ball
episodes.overview: Mi's excited to enter a dance contestant --where the last birdie dancing wins, but stays up SO late with Presto the night before that it's gonna be hard to stay awake and keep dancing. / Harmony and Melody lend Do, Re and Mi their starball and the best bird friends come up with lots of ways to play with it.

episodes.name: Mi's Berry Bounce / Tweeting Games
episodes.overview: Mi sets out to break a berry bouncing record and Mi's best pals are ready to help...until one of 'em messes up the bounce. / Do, Re & Mi compete as a team in the Tweeting Games. Can they stay in unison to win the Golden Birdie Trophy?

episodes.name: Song From the Heart / Who Wants to Be Like Me?
episodes.overview: Pequena gets nervous around Flora Flamingo and writes a song to share her feelings about her. / Seymore Saymore wants to be just like Mi, and Mi wants to be like Juan Peacock. Both birds try to look and sound like their musical idols with funny results.

episodes.name: Ha Ha Hummingbird / Buzzing the Way
episodes.overview: Re loves to get a laugh and today she's gonna make ten birdies laugh--easier said than done when everyone is so distracted. / When Mi gets stuck, Presto has to go find help--but the other birds can't speak lightning bug-- how can he get them to understand his message?

episodes.name: Re the Brave / Cooling to the Beat
episodes.overview: Do, Re & Mi go camping and tell spooky stories about a Ghost Crow until Do gets frightened. Re insists she's never afraid, until she hears a mysterious sound in the woods. / On a hot day in Beebopsburgh, the birdies are trying to stay cool and discover one dance move that makes its own cool breeze.

episodes.name: Flight School / All About Juan Peacock
episodes.overview: Do goes to flying school, but is nervous about flying in front of the other students, especially Chester, who he imagines is good at everything. / With Pequena away, Do Re & Mi play with Juan Peacock - but the group has some trouble getting along when Juan Peacock insists on doing things his unique way.

episodes.name: Sing it Forward / Do, Re, Remember Mi?
episodes.overview: Mi and Re help Do organize his workshop and end up going down memory lane as Do gives sentimental items away to his friends. / Do, Re & Mi go grocery shopping for Mama Maddie, but keep forgetting what's on their shopping list.

episodes.name: Music Blossoms and Blooms / Vine and Dandy
episodes.overview: Do, Re & Mi are taking the Flamingo-gos to Falsetto Forest for the blooming of the instruments. / It's a race through Falsetto Forest and Mi is determined to win, but may need to learn how to try again when things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: Shoobop Gone / Flap Your Own Way
episodes.overview: Mi loses a favorite guitar, Shoobop and can't find inspiration to sing without it. / Do flies! Do wishes he could flap faster, but discovers his flying speed might be just what's needed to save the day.
